name: Tokyo Free Black Figma Design Kit
description:
Tokyo Free Black Figma Design Kit is a free and open source design UI Kit built for Figma.


It can be used to create application interfaces and admin dashboards for multi-purpose projects.


Tokyo features multiple useful components and elements that will give you a head start in prototyping your ideas.


The main characteristic of this Figma UI Kit is it’s dark style color scheme that can be easily customized using the included editable color styles.


This UI Kit contains variants for all most used elements like buttons, badges and form components. It also includes a dashboard example page, status pages and auth screens.

 

Upgrade to PRO

We have also developed a premium version for this UI Kit which contains more examples pages, more dashboards and 300+ ready to use components. You can read more about it by visiting it’s dedicated presentation here.
